attributes.action: To Ensure That All Food & Drink Products Sold To The British Public Are Clearly Labeled That They Contain Genetically Modified Organisms (GMO's)
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition to ensure that the government ensures that all food and drink products sold to the British Public has clear labeling on it informing the public that it contains Genetically Modified Organisms (GMO's) in it.

rejection.details: See 'Clear food labelling for Genetically Modified ingredients'
